channel.title: A Text to Speech channel is setup

description.1: This server has a dedicated Text to Speech channel setup at {channel}, please post messages in that channel for generating audio.
description.2: If you are a server administrator, you can change or remove the channel [on your guild's dashboard]({url}).

description.1: The speaker you selected does not eixst, please use the autocomplete options or [set a default voice]({url}).
description.2: If this continues to happen, please ask in our [support server]({url}), thank you.

description.1: Audio generation doesn't grow on trees! Support us with a [quick vote on top.gg]({url}), it allows people to find {name} more easily, thank you for your support!
description.2: Voting for me will allow you access to generate {newamount} characters instead of just {amount} for the next 12 hours!

error.title: There was an error while generating

description.1: This usually happens if the input language does not match the language of the speaker, try changing the input language or the speaker.
description.2: If you think this is a bug, please report it on our [support server]({url}), we're sorry.

button.invite_tts: Get a 2nd Text to Speech Bot for Voice Chats

novc: You're not connected to any voice channels.
toolong: Your message exceeds the server's limit with {count} characters. The maximum allowed is {max}.
alreadyplaying: Wait until the audio by {user} is done playing, use {command} if it's stuck.
set_default_voice: The default voice is now set to {voice}.

set_cts.enabled: Chat to Speech has been enabled.
set_cts.disabled: Chat to SPeech has been disabled.
set_cts.note: This change only applies to you, globally in every guild.
